title: Woman In Love
lyrics: ..Life is a moment in space When the dream is gone It’s a lonelier place ..I kiss the morning goodbye ..you know we never know why ..I turn away from the wall I stumble and fall But I give you it all ..I am a woman in love And I do anything To get you into my world And hold you within It’s a right |I defend |.... |Over and over again | What do I do?
